songs.title: Things We Lost In the Fire (beGun Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(A list)
(We had)
(A list)
(We had)

[Verse 1]
We sat and made a list (A list)
Of all the things that we had (We had)
I read them all one day
When loneliness came and you were a way
Oh they told me nothing new
But I loved to read the words you used

[Pre-Chorus]
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
Fire, fire, fire
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
Fire, fire, fire

[Chorus]
(Fire) These are the things
(Fire) The things we lost
(Fire) The things we lost in the fire, fire, fire
(Fire) These are the things
(Fire) The things we lost
(Fire) The things we lost in the fire, fire, fire

[Verse 2]
(Fire) Made a list
(Fire)
(Fire, made a list)
(Fire, had)
Oh they told me nothing new
But I loved to read the words you used

[Chorus]
(Fire) These are the things
(Fire) The things we lost
(Fire) The things we lost in the fire, fire, fire
(Fire) These are the things
(Fire) The things we lost
(Fire) The things we lost in the fire, fire, fire
(Fire) The things we lost
(Fire) The things we lost in the fire, fire, fire
(Fire) These are the things
(Fire) The things we lost
(Fire) The things we lost in the fire, fire, fire

[Post-Chorus]
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
Fire, fire, fire
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
(Fire) Fire
Fire, fire, fire
